Checks if the game is over.
checkWin(Player) - Method in class edu.connect4.Board
Checks whether the specified player has won the game by forming a line of 4 consecutive disks of their designated color on the board.

I

isBoardFull() - Method in class edu.connect4.Board
Checks if the board is full, meaning there are no more open spots for disks on the board.

P

play(int) - Method in class edu.connect4.Game
Executes a play for the current player by dropping a disk in the given column.

Renders the Connect 4 board grid as text.
Renderer - Class in edu.connect4
The Renderer class is used to render a board according to different clients.
Renderer() - Constructor for class edu.connect4.Renderer
 
resetBoard() - Method in class edu.connect4.Board
Resets the game board to its initial state with all cells set to null.

S

startGame() - Method in class edu.connect4.Game
Starts the game by emptying the board and setting current player to player 1.

T

TextBasedClient - Class in edu.connect4
The TextBasedClient is a client for the Connect 4 game, it receives inputs such as player's name and the column location to drop the disc from the CLI.
TextBasedClient() - Constructor for class edu.connect4.TextBasedClient
